Html:
Hello,

WasapiCapture stops with the following error messag:
Offset and length were outside the range of the array or the number larger than the number of elements from index to the end of the withholding amount.

What does this mean?

Thanks
not seen that one before. Can you reproduce it?
It seems that when the software freezes or I stop the software with a breakpoint I get this message. Also it seems to be coming from windows, because it is in the language of the windows.
